attributes.action: encourage with high fuel prices the return of freight to Rail and Water Transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We need to use less fuel and take lorries off the road, except for local deliveries. Its better for the environment and better for our economy.
With more investment in suitable infrustructure using money taken from higher fuel prices.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
